# constellation Provider

The Constellation provider manages Constellation clusters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    constellation = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/edgelesssys/constellation"
    }
  }
}

provider "constellation" {}
```
